requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 with Service Pack 1
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 660
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel i3/Ryzen 3 series
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: When play the game close all browser for performance boost.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 (8.1)/ 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4570 3.20GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 4GB | AMD Radeon R9 290X 4GB @1080p
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: When play the game close all browser for performance boost.
